name: Planet Escape (Chippy)
description:
You are shipwrecked on a planet and must collect parts for you're ship in order to escape.  Explore the planet to fight monsters and get pieces for your ship.  However, you can only hold so many items before you run out of space in you're inventory.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Pickup

E - Eat Meat

R - Rotate Item

ESC - Close Game
